name: Do Your Work
discription: This is a simple to-do list. This helps you to manage yout tasks. Also your data is safe in local storage so it won't lost.

name: Guess The Number
discription: A simple JavaScript fun game which randomly generates a number and give hints one you start guesssing. Also computer maintains a high score.

name: Forkify
discription: This is a NodeJS application which takes recipes from a API and render it. Also it shows discription of recipe and ingredients per serving.

name: CoR Visualizer
discription: This is a Java Application. It helps user to visualize how ball simulates when it hits ground. GUI is designed in JavaFX.

name: Contact Management API
discription: This is a RESTful API. It helps to search contacts, create new contact, update and delete one. This helps in managing contects.
